remarks: Alternate elimitation of a restricted existential quantifier, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Sep-2017.)
statement:
ceqsrexv2.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsrexv2 $p |- ( E. x e. B ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ( A e. B /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ps x $.
